items.name: The Torrent's Reclamation
implicitMods: 37% increased Critical Strike Chance during any Flask Effect
explicitMods: Grants Summon Greater Harbinger of Time Skill
77% increased Block and Stun Recovery during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Seven-League Step
flavourText: "Death can be outrun with these, but beware!
In running from death, you may forget to live."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
You and nearby allies have +15% chance to Evade Attack Hits
Suppressed Spell Damage dealt to you is Unlucky
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies additional chance to evade attacks, and makes suppressed spell damage unlucky against you.

items.typeLine: Bottomless Quartz Flask of the Hummingbird
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
explicitMods: 50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 29% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 18% less Action Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rearguard
implicitMods: Adds 7 to 14 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: "It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

items.typeLine: Bottomless Stibnite Flask of the Lynx
implicitMods: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Widowhail
explicitMods: 247% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: Ensnared Enemies take 19% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 38% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
